user_query: I'm planning a road trip with my friends and we need some good music to keep us entertained. Can you help us search for popular tracks on Deezer and Soundcloud? Also, provide us with the radio stations and editorial content related to our favorite genres. We would appreciate it!

TaskList.description: Search for popular music tracks on Deezer.
Search for popular music tracks on Soundcloud.
Find radio stations related to the favorite genres.
Gather editorial content related to the favorite genres.
